column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I have traveled extensively and always enjoy visiting art museums
column2: but there is none greater than the Art Institute of Chicago.  The permanent collections are fabulous and the ones that are here for a short time are of the highest caliber.  There are special programs year round and the restaurants are also 5-star quality.  I have gone as a teacher taking students on a field trip
column3: as a mother bringing her own children and I've gone many times by myself to just be immersed in art and history and culture.  I recommend the Art Institute as a must-see if anyone is coming to Chicago for the first time.
